verses.verse: And <WG2532> it came to pass,<WG1096> that on<WG1722> one<WG3391> of those<WG1565> days,<WG2250> as he<WG846> taught<WG1321> the<WG3588> people<WG2992> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> temple,<WG2411> and<WG2532> preached the gospel,<WG2097> the<WG3588> chief priests<WG749> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> scribes<WG1122> came upon<WG2186> him with<WG4862> the<WG3588> elders,<WG4245>

And <WG2532> spake<WG2036> unto<WG4314> him,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> Tell<WG2036> us,<WG2254> by<WG1722> what<WG4169> authority<WG1849> doest<WG4160> thou these things?<WG5023> or<WG2228> who<WG5101> is<WG2076> he that gave<WG1325> thee<WG4671> this<WG5026> authority?<WG1849>
And <WG1161> he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them,<WG846> I will also ask <WG2504> <WG2065> you <WG5209> one<WG1520> thing;<WG3056> and<WG2532> answer<WG2036> me: <WG3427>
The <WG3588> baptism<WG908> of John,<WG2491> was<WG2258> it from<WG1537> heaven,<WG3772> or<WG2228> of<WG1537> men? <WG444>

And <WG1161> they<WG3588> reasoned<WG4817> with<WG4314> themselves,<WG1438> saying,<WG3004> If<WG1437> we shall say,<WG2036> From<WG1537> heaven;<WG3772> he will say,<WG2046> Why<WG1302> then<WG3767> believed<WG4100> ye him<WG846> not?<WG3756>

But <WG1161> and if<WG1437> we say,<WG2036> Of<WG1537> men;<WG444> all<WG3956> the<WG3588> people<WG2992> will stone<WG2642> us:<WG2248> for<WG1063> they be<WG2076> persuaded<WG3982> that John<WG2491> was<WG1511> a prophet.<WG4396>
And <WG2532> they answered,<WG611> that they could not<WG3361> tell<WG1492> whence<WG4159> it was.
And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> unto them,<WG846> Neither <WG3761> tell<WG3004> I<WG1473> you<WG5213> by<WG1722> what<WG4169> authority<WG1849> I do<WG4160> these things. <WG5023>

Then <WG1161> began<WG756> he to speak<WG3004> to<WG4314> the<WG3588> people<WG2992> this<WG5026> parable;<WG3850> A certain<WG5100> man<WG444> planted<WG5452> a vineyard,<WG290> and<WG2532> let it forth <WG1554> <WG846> to husbandmen,<WG1092> and<WG2532> went into a far country<WG589> for a long<WG2425> time. <WG5550>

And <WG2532> at<WG1722> the season<WG2540> he sent<WG649> a servant<WG1401> to<WG4314> the<WG3588> husbandmen,<WG1092> that<WG2443> they should give<WG1325> him<WG846> of<WG575> the<WG3588> fruit<WG2590> of the<WG3588> vineyard: <WG290> but<WG1161> the<WG3588> husbandmen<WG1092> beat<WG1194> him,<WG846> and sent him away<WG1821> empty. <WG2756>

And <WG2532> again he sent <WG4369> <WG3992> another <WG2087> servant: <WG1401> and<WG1161> they<WG3588> beat<WG1194> him also,<WG2548> and<WG2532> entreated him shamefully,<WG818> and sent him away<WG1821> empty. <WG2756>
And <WG2532> again he sent <WG4369> <WG3992> a third: <WG5154> and<WG1161> they<WG3588> wounded<WG5135> him<WG5126> also, and<WG2532> cast him out. <WG1544>

Then <WG1161> said<WG2036> the<WG3588> lord<WG2962> of the<WG3588> vineyard,<WG290> What<WG5101> shall I do?<WG4160> I will send<WG3992> my<WG3450> beloved<WG27> son: <WG5207> it may be<WG2481> they will reverence<WG1788> him when they see<WG1492> him. <WG5126>

But <WG1161> when the<WG3588> husbandmen<WG1092> saw<WG1492> him,<WG846> they reasoned<WG1260> among<WG4314> themselves,<WG1438> saying,<WG3004> This<WG3778> is<WG2076> the<WG3588> heir: <WG2818> come,<WG1205> let us kill<WG615> him,<WG846> that<WG2443> the<WG3588> inheritance<WG2817> may be<WG1096> ours. <WG2254>

So <WG2532> they cast<WG1544> him<WG846> out<WG1854> of the<WG3588> vineyard,<WG290> and killed<WG615> him. What<WG5101> therefore<WG3767> shall the<WG3588> lord<WG2962> of the<WG3588> vineyard<WG290> do<WG4160> unto them? <WG846>

He shall come<WG2064> and<WG2532> destroy<WG622> these<WG5128> husbandmen,<WG1092> and<WG2532> shall give<WG1325> the<WG3588> vineyard<WG290> to others. And<WG243> <WG1161> when they heard<WG191> it, they said,<WG2036> God forbid.<WG1096> <WG3361>

And <WG1161> he<WG3588> beheld<WG1689> them,<WG846> and said,<WG2036> What <WG5101> is<WG2076> this<WG5124> then<WG3767> that is written,<WG1125> The stone<WG3037> which<WG3739> the<WG3588> builders<WG3618> rejected,<WG593> the same<WG3778> is become<WG1096> the<WG1519> head<WG2776> of the corner? <WG1137>

Whosoever <WG3956> shall fall<WG4098> upon<WG1909> that<WG1565> stone<WG3037> shall be broken;<WG4917> but<WG1161> on<WG1909> whomsoever <WG3739> <WG302> it shall fall,<WG4098> it will grind him to powder. <WG3039> <WG846>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> chief priests<WG749> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> scribes<WG1122> the same<WG846> hour<WG5610> sought<WG2212> to lay<WG1911> hands<WG5495> on<WG1909> him;<WG846> and<WG2532> they feared<WG5399> the<WG3588> people:<WG2992> for<WG1063> they perceived<WG1097> that<WG3754> he had spoken<WG2036> this<WG5026> parable<WG3850> against<WG4314> them.<WG846>

And <WG2532> they watched<WG3906> him, and sent forth<WG649> spies,<WG1455> which should feign<WG5271> themselves<WG1438> just men,<WG1342> that<WG2443> they might take hold<WG1949> of his<WG846> words,<WG3056> that so they might deliver<WG3860> him<WG846> unto the<WG3588> power<WG746> and<WG2532> authority<WG1849> of the<WG3588> governor.<WG2232>

And <WG2532> they asked<WG1905> him,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> Master,<WG1320> we know<WG1492> that<WG3754> thou sayest<WG3004> and<WG2532> teachest<WG1321> rightly,<WG3723> neither<WG2532> <WG3756> acceptest<WG2983> thou the person<WG4383> of any, but<WG235> teachest<WG1321> the<WG3588> way<WG3598> of God<WG2316> truly:<WG1909> <WG225>
Is it lawful<WG1832> for us<WG2254> to give<WG1325> tribute<WG5411> unto Caesar,<WG2541> or<WG2228> no?<WG3756>
But <WG1161> he perceived<WG2657> their<WG848> craftiness,<WG3834> and said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them,<WG846> Why <WG5101> tempt<WG3985> ye me? <WG3165>
Show <WG1925> me<WG3427> a penny.<WG1220> Whose<WG5101> image<WG1504> and<WG2532> superscription<WG1923> hath<WG2192> it? They<WG1161> answered<WG611> and said,<WG2036> Caesar's.<WG2541>

And <WG1161> he<WG3588> said<WG2036> unto them,<WG846> Render <WG591> therefore<WG5106> unto Caesar<WG2541> the things<WG3588> which be Caesar's<WG2541> and<WG2532> unto God<WG2316> the things<WG3588> which be God's. <WG2316>

And <WG2532> they could<WG2480> not<WG3756> take hold<WG1949> of his<WG846> words<WG4487> before<WG1726> the<WG3588> people:<WG2992> and<WG2532> they marveled<WG2296> at<WG1909> his<WG846> answer,<WG612> and held their peace.<WG4601>
Then <WG1161> came<WG4334> to him certain<WG5100> of the<WG3588> Sadducees,<WG4523> which deny<WG483> that there is<WG1511> any<WG3361> resurrection:<WG386> and they asked<WG1905> him,<WG846>

saying, <WG3004> Master,<WG1320> Moses<WG3475> wrote<WG1125> unto us,<WG2254> If<WG1437> any man's<WG5100> brother<WG80> die,<WG599> having<WG2192> a wife,<WG1135> and<WG2532> he<WG3778> die<WG599> without children,<WG815> that<WG2443> his<WG846> brother<WG80> should take<WG2983> his wife,<WG1135> and<WG2532> raise up<WG1817> seed<WG4690> unto his<WG848> brother.<WG80>
There were<WG2258> therefore<WG3767> seven<WG2033> brethren:<WG80> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> first<WG4413> took<WG2983> a wife,<WG1135> and died<WG599> without children.<WG815>
And <WG2532> the<WG3588> second<WG1208> took<WG2983> her to wife,<WG1135> and<WG2532> he<WG3778> died<WG599> childless.<WG815>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> third<WG5154> took<WG2983> her;<WG846> and<WG1161> in like manner<WG5615> the<WG3588> seven<WG2033> also:<WG2532> and they left<WG2641> no<WG3756> children,<WG5043> and<WG2532> died.<WG599>
<WG1161> Last<WG5305> of all<WG3956> the<WG3588> woman<WG1135> died<WG599> also.<WG2532>
Therefore <WG3767> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> resurrection<WG386> whose<WG5101> wife<WG1135> of them<WG846> is she?<WG1096> for<WG1063> seven<WG2033> had<WG2192> her<WG846> to wife.<WG1135>
And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> answering<WG611> said<WG2036> unto them,<WG846> The <WG3588> children<WG5207> of this<WG5127> world<WG165> marry,<WG1060> and<WG2532> are given in marriage: <WG1548>

But <WG1161> they which shall be accounted worthy<WG2661> to obtain<WG5177> that<WG1565> world,<WG165> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> resurrection<WG386> from<WG1537> the dead,<WG3498> neither<WG3777> marry,<WG1060> nor<WG3777> are given in marriage: <WG1548>

<WG1063> Neither <WG3777> can<WG1410> they die<WG599> any more: <WG2089> for<WG1063> they are<WG1526> equal unto the angels;<WG2465> and<WG2532> are<WG1526> the children<WG5207> of God,<WG2316> being<WG5607> the children<WG5207> of the<WG3588> resurrection. <WG386>

Now <WG1161> that<WG3754> the<WG3588> dead<WG3498> are raised,<WG1453> even<WG2532> Moses<WG3475> showed<WG3377> at<WG1909> the<WG3588> bush,<WG942> when<WG5613> he calleth<WG3004> the Lord<WG2962> the<WG3588> God<WG2316> of Abraham,<WG11> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> God<WG2316> of Isaac,<WG2464> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> God<WG2316> of Jacob. <WG2384>
For <WG1161> he is<WG2076> not<WG3756> a God<WG2316> of the dead,<WG3498> but<WG235> of the living: <WG2198> for<WG1063> all<WG3956> live<WG2198> unto him. <WG846>
Then <WG1161> certain<WG5100> of the<WG3588> scribes<WG1122> answering<WG611> said,<WG2036> Master,<WG1320> thou hast well<WG2573> said.<WG2036>
And <WG1161> after that they durst<WG5111> not<WG3765> ask<WG1905> him<WG846> any<WG3762> question at all.
And <WG1161> he said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them,<WG846> How <WG4459> say<WG3004> they that Christ<WG5547> is<WG1511> David's<WG1138> son? <WG5207>

And <WG2532> David<WG1138> himself<WG846> saith <WG3004> in <WG1722> the book<WG976> of Psalms,<WG5568> The<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> said<WG2036> unto my<WG3450> Lord,<WG2962> Sit<WG2521> thou on<WG1537> my<WG3450> right hand, <WG1188>
Till <WG2193> <WG302> I make<WG5087> thine<WG4675> enemies<WG2190> thy<WG4675> footstool. <WG5286> <WG4228>
David <WG1138> therefore<WG3767> calleth<WG2564> him<WG846> Lord,<WG2962> how<WG4459> is he<WG2076> then<WG2532> his<WG846> son? <WG5207>
Then <WG1161> in the audience<WG191> of all<WG3956> the<WG3588> people<WG2992> he said<WG2036> unto his<WG848> disciples,<WG3101>

Beware <WG4337> of<WG575> the<WG3588> scribes,<WG1122> which desire<WG2309> to walk<WG4043> in<WG1722> long robes,<WG4749> and<WG2532> love<WG5368> greetings<WG783> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> markets,<WG58> and<WG2532> the highest seats<WG4410> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> synagogues,<WG4864> and<WG2532> the chief rooms<WG4411> at<WG1722> feasts; <WG1173>

Which <WG3739> devour<WG2719> widows'<WG5503> houses,<WG3614> and<WG2532> for a show<WG4392> make long prayers: <WG4336> <WG3117> the same<WG3778> shall receive<WG2983> greater<WG4055> damnation. <WG2917>
